title: EP.42: NBA DRAFT, GM TAKEOVER, TEXAS QB BATTLE, SUPERTEAMS, AND MUCH MORE!
description: Tune in to find out what we think of the top NBA draft picks. Bust or star? What we would do if we took over the GM position for the worst NFL teams in the league. Who we would take to build our NBA superteam. Where will the loser of the Texas QB battle go? Much more discussed on this episode.
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
